sort

Class MultiMerger

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • sort.MultiMerger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MultiMerger
extends java.lang.Thread
    class for sorting an array in multi-threaded way and measuring the sorting time
    Author:
    VladMakarevich
